nodes.text: A Togruta female lived on the colony planet of Kiros around 21 BBY during the events of the Clone Wars, a major galactic conflict fought between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

The Togruta lived on the planet Kiros along with thousands of colonists when the Separatist forces arrived on the planet to move the population to a Kadavo slave processing facility on Kadavo and establish a base on the planet.

Following a rescue mission by the Galactic Republic, a Venator-class Star Destroyer along with many other smaller starships and gunships were sent to the planet to free the prisoners. During the ensuing battle, the Keeper of the labor facility, Agruss, decided to kill the prisoners by electrifying the walls of their prison chamber and opening a hatch underneath so they would fall to their deaths.

Padawan Ahsoka Tano realized the desperate situation and ordered that the Star Destroyer fly underneath the facility and deploy a squadron of jetpack clone troopers who would attach cables from the facility to the ship, allowing the prisoners to slide down to safety. During the rescue operation, this Togruta tried to reach the cable in front of her but accidentally fell of the ship. She was saved by Ahsoka Tano and transported along with the rest of the colonists back to Kiros.
The Togruta female first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series season four episode Kidnapped and was voiced by Ashley Eckstein, the same actress that voices Ahsoka Tano.
